text: It had always been the great violinist's dream to play underwater so that it could be heard above, creating musical nuances. In the deserted, silent garden and above the green waters, like a shadow in the water, there were heard compasses of something very melancholy that could have been called The joy of dying, and after one last glu glu the violin came floating like a ship of children that began to drown disoriented. FIN
title: El sueño del violinista
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
